data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra, Western Sahara will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra, Western Sahara
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: the state of Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra has (about) 2 people who know Jesus, 81 people who know about him culturally, and 301,716 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, let those from the 2 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Saharawi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Saharawi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Saharawi people is yours.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra, Western Sahara a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra, Western Sahara to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.focus_label: Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra, Western Sahara

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra
location.full_name: Laâyoune - Boujdour - Sakia El Hamra, Western Sahara
